name: Simpleaddition
0:
”Alexa, ask simple addition for how much is 5 plus 3”
”Alexa, ask simple addition for how much is 1 plus 4”
”Alexa, ask simple addition for how much is 0 plus 100”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: simple addition
des: Using this skill, the user will be able to asks the questions "How much is a + b ?" (eg: How much is 11 plus 13), Alexa will then reply with the answer (eg: 11 + 13 is 24).
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
